publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3345 Mr Frank McAveety: Evening Times Community Champions—That the Parliament congratulates all finalists of the Evening Times Glasgow Community Champion Awards; thanks the finalists for earning recognition for the individuals committed to community development in Glasgow; acknowledges that this is a testament to the hard work of volunteers across the south side of Glasgow, and offers particular congratulations to Blanche Tinney, winner of the individual award, Andy Carberry, winner of the public service individual award and the Active Life Club, winner of the team award. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie McGrigor*, James Kelly*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-3345 Evening Times Community Champions (lodged on 30 January 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Bob Doris*, David Whitton*
S3M-3345 Evening Times Community Champions (lodged on 30 January 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3345 Evening Times Community Champions (lodged on 30 January 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3345 Evening Times Community Champions (lodged on 30 January 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-3345 Evening Times Community Champions (lodged on 30 January 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3345 Evening Times Community Champions (lodged on 30 January 2009) David Stewart*
